description:
Releasing the second character music pack "Remilia Scarlet Music Pack" featuring all arranged versions of "Septette for a Dead Princess"!
Once again, it also includes an exclusive Remilia Scarlet-themed nameplate and emblem badge!

This pack contains the following:

■6 Songs
・Scarlet Dance / Kishida Kyodan & The Akeboshi Rockets
・Strawberry Song / TaNaBaTa
・SCAPEGOAT BOY / SOUND HOLIC feat. Nana Takahashi
・R.I.P. / Hatsunetsumiko's
・Akaboshi Miserables / Tokyo Active NEETs
・Such Adorable Scarlets Can't Possibly Be My Mistresses / IOSYS

■1 Nameplate / 1 Emblem Badge

■6 Challenge Stages
・Lv.5 Obsolete Memory (Akaboshi Miserables ~ Haiokuhen)
・Lv.6 This is Risky (Such Adorable Scarlets Can't Possibly Be My Mistresses)
・Lv.7 Over and Over (R.I.P.)
・Lv.8 Pride (Scarlet Dance)
・Lv.9 Strawberry Juice, Too (Strawberry Song)
・Lv.10 Goodnight, Goodbye (SCAPEGOAT BOY)

 * Internet connection required for purchase.
 * Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.
name: Remilia Scarlet Music Pack
